guides.name: Johnny Bob
biography: Johnny was born in Preston, ID and grew up loving to raft.

guides.name: David Short
biography: David is a fish at heart.

guides.name: Franklin Small
biography: Franklin is an expert in the rafting industry. He is the owner and founder of Salmon River Adventures.
He has a love for the outdoors and loves to share his love with others.

guides.name: Katrina Abble
biography: Katrina is a outdoor buff. She has multiple certifications in white water rafting and excited to share her passion with others.
